scripts.build: npm run test && lerna run build --stream --parallel
scripts.::changeset: yarn changeset add && git add .changeset && git commit -m '[release:changelog] update changeset'; echo 'We commited your changeset. You should defo push this master ✌️'
scripts.::release: manypkg check && yarn build && lerna publish && yarn run changeset
